titles: Die Mercurii, 19. July, 1643. The Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, out of the deep sense of Gods heavy wrath now upon this kingdome, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An Order of Parliament, appointing 21 July as a Fast-Day.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
